long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SMS - Social Media Shortcut

Enhance your social media experience with SMS! This app is designed for the social media platforms we visit daily, offering quick access to your favorite sites. Add up to 40 different websites and streamline your online interactions.
